profile.name: Chinmoy Chakma
profile.summary: 3+ years of experience in Software Testing & QA with expertise in automation testing, API testing, and quality management.
profile.about: I’m a passionate Software Quality Assurance Engineer focused on delivering high-quality web and mobile applications through comprehensive testing strategies. I work across manual and automation testing, build maintainable test suites, and collaborate closely with developers and product teams to ship reliable releases.

experience.title: Software Quality Assurance Engineer(Intern)
highlights: Led a QA team to test web and mobile applications
Built automation suites using Selenium/Cypress, reducing manual effort
Collaborated with devs/PMs to improve CI/CD release quality
Managed test plans, regression cycles, and reporting

experience.title: Software Quality Assurance Engineer
highlights: Designed test cases and maintained test documentation
Performed functional, regression, and exploratory testing
Worked on API testing with Postman and REST Assured
Mentored junior testers and improved QA process

experience.title: Junior Software Quality Assurance Engineer
highlights: Assisted in test case development and execution
Reported bugs with clear repro steps and logs
Participated in sprint QA and release testing

education.details: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science & Engineering with focus on software development and QA.
Science background with Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

education.institute: Chittagong Municipal Model School and College
education.details: Secondary School Certificate in Science with strong academic results.
